editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-7r: Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡. F-11v: Supplications, Nästäbqwu‘ǝ, ናስተብቍዕ፡. F-xxx: Litany, Liṭon, ሊጦን፡, arranged for the days of the week: Monday (11v), Enzä Nä’äkwǝto, እንዘ፡ ነአኵቶ፡; Tuesday (12r), Sǝmǝkä Ḥǝyaw, ስምከ፡ ሕያው፡; Wednesday (13r), Lä-tǝruṣ Egzi’o, ለትሩጽ፡ እግዚኦ፡; Thursday (13v), Kämä Tadäḫnännä, ከመ፡ ታድኅነነ፡; Friday (14r), Täzäkkär Egzi’o, ተዘከር፡ እግዚኦ፡; additional for Holy Saturday (15r), Sobä ‘äkko Egzi’abḫer, ሶበ፡ አኮ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡; Saturday (15v), Qädame Ṣägga, ቀዳሚ፡ ጸጋ፡; Sunday (16r), Lä-’amǝlakä Mǝḥrät, ለአምላከ፡ ምሕረት፡. Cf. Me‘erāf I 7–12; MQ 262ff. for evening, Aməlakənä (17r), አምላክነ. F-xxx: The Ordinary of the Mass, ሥርዓተ፡ ቅዳሴ፡, with musical notation. Incipit: ሚመጠን: ግርምት: ዛቲ: ዕለት: F-53v: Anaphora of the Apostles, Qǝddase Ḫawaryat, ቅዳሴ፡ ሐዋርያት፡. F-64v: Anaphora of Our Lord, ቅዳሴ፡ እግዚእ፡. F-72v: Anaphora of Dioscorus, Qǝddase Diosǝqoros, ቅዳሴ፡ ዲዮስቆሮስ፡. Ff. Varia. Ff. i v-ii r: Excerpt from the beginning of the Anaphora of our Lord, prayer for the deacon. F. ii r: Excerpt from the ordinary of the mass, incomplete at beginning and end. and 40v mention ቄርሎስ (V, 1874-1927) and ጴጥሮስ (IV, 1881-1889). and passim mention, ወልደ ኢየሱስ (owner of the book?).
